house.Wall insulation: desc_What sustainability improvements have you already made? Hollow wall insulation
house.Additional insulation: desc_What sustainability improvements have you already made? Additional insulation
house.Roof/floor insulation: desc_What sustainability improvements have you already made? Roof and/or floor insulation
house.WOZ: desc_What is the WOZ value of your dwelling?

hh.Device: desc_On which device are you playing this choice game?
hh.Education: desc_What is your highest completed education?
hh.Gender: desc_Which gender do you identify with the most?
hh.Household: desc_Who is currently part of your household?
hh.Age: desc_To which age group do you belong?
hh.Employment: desc_Which best describes your employment situation?

bias.Municipality: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements?  [I enjoy living in my municipality]
bias.Neighborhood: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements?  [I enjoy living in my neighborhood]
bias.Capable municipality: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements?  [The municipality is best able to determine the most affordable way to phase out natural gas]
bias.Capable individuals: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements?  [Residents are capable of deciding for themselves how to phase out natural gas]
bias.Heat price: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements?  [Heat prices should be as equal as possible for everyone in the municipality]
bias.Climate: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements?  [I am climate-conscious]
bias.Reactance municipality: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements?  [I believe the municipality has already decided everything about the heat transition, and my opinion does not matter]

bias2.PONG alternatives: desc_Had you heard about the alternatives to natural gas (heating network and/or heat pump) before participating in this choice game?
bias2.People PONG positive: desc_In your opinion, how many people are positive about phasing out natural gas?
bias2.DH opinion: desc_What is your opinion on district heating after having heard everything?
bias2.HP opinion: desc_What is your opinion on heat pumps after having heard everything?
